modName: Star Wars Mod - Sith Pureblood Race
summary: This mod adds the Sith Pureblood Race
descriptionHtml:
Sith Pureblood Race

[img] http://box.jisko.net/i/d192a822.png[/img]


[img]http://box.jisko.net/i/6b41d6b1.png[/img]

First of all, sorry my english, I’m spanish.

This mod creates a new race, the Sith Pureblood race from Star Wars.
The mod adds:

-	New different hair
-	New dirt
-	New eye colors
-	New eyebrows
-	New skin color (for now, only red)
- 	New beards


Sith Pureblood: They born in the world of Korriban. They have facial tentacles. They have force powers and they usually are in the dark side of the Force.

You can be a male Sith Pureblood, but you can’t be a female Sith Pureblood because the female characters can’t have beard, I have to fix it in the 0.7 version, but don’t worry, I will fix it.

Skill Bonus:

Two-handed +10
Heavy armor +5
Destruction +5
Sneak +5
Alteration +5
One handed +5

Race power: Invisibility (same power of vampires)

For now, this mod is available in English (see the version information below)

Video (trailer):

[youtube]EjPxMy2d0FA[/youtube] [youtube]92Myd6PX4ic[/youtube]
                  [youtube]xF6yHTZhrx4[/youtube]


VERSION LOG

Version 0.4

-	New different hair
-	New dirt
-	New eye colors
-	New eyebrows
-	New skin color (for now, only red)
- 	New beards
-       Only you can make male characters.


Bugs:

- One beard is black (flip normals), I will fix it in the 0.5 version.


[img]http://box.jisko.net/i/86a1dee7.png[/img]

Put the files you find in the archive into skyrim data folder. (\\\\Steam\\\\SteamApps\\\\common\\\\skyrim\\\\Data)


[img]http://box.jisko.net/i/5f690acd.png[/img]


Delete the archives:

SithRace.esp (data folder)
textures\\sith (folder)
meshes\\sith (folder)


[img]http://box.jisko.net/i/1e9e682e.png[/img]


-	Me, I made the hair, beards and eyebrows meshes and textures, the dirt, eye color and skin color.
-	Bethesda, for create Skyrim

-       TheVet&TheNo0b(Artoriasx), he made the spanish traduction of the 0.4 version.

Special Thanks:

-	Star Wars and The Clone Wars creators (lucasarts), for create the Star Wars films and The Clone Wars series television and for the fantastic world of Star Wars
-	Bethesda, create Skyrim, the best videogame.
-	My best friend (thanks Kuri :)) and two friends, they encouraged me all time :D
-  	SWTOR creators, for create a reference for me with the Sith Pureblood race.
- 	Of course, all of you, for vote, download and play my race in Skyrim :) Thank you guys, you are awesome.


Permissions:
If you want to use this race in your mod, just send a pm to me, contact me on Twitter or Youtube, and I will give you permission.

[img]http://box.jisko.net/i/387396ee.jpg[/img]
